episodes.title: The Kanungu Massacre: Uganda’s Deadliest Cult Story | Abel Mutua Minisode 10 Ep 2
episodes.description:
The Kanungu Massacre: Uganda’s Deadliest Cult Story | Abel Mutua Minisode 10 Ep 3

In this chilling minisode, Abel Mutua dives into the shocking true story of the Kanungu Massacre—a tragedy that shook Uganda and the entire continent. Over 530 followers of a doomsday cult were burned alive inside a church, misled by leaders of the Movement for the Restoration of the Ten Commandments of God. What started as a religious revival turned into one of Africa’s most horrifying mass murders.
This is a dark, powerful reminder of how far blind faith can go—and how silence, fear, and manipulation can turn deadly.
How did no one see it coming? Who were the mysterious leaders? And why do some believe the masterminds are still out there?

🔔 Don’t forget to like, comment, and subscribe for more minisodes that reveal the truth behind the headlines.
